hero.subline: Automate your flat-rate quarterly billing with QuartaBill - the intelligent desktop app for recurring invoices. Perfect for occupational physicians, consulting companies, and service providers. Fully automated PDF generation, email delivery, and cloud sync included.

features.headline: Automation in Detail
features.subline: QuartaBill automates every step of your quarterly billing - from customer management to PDF delivery. Designed for service providers with recurring quarterly flat-rate fees.

customer_management.title: Customer Management
customer_management.description: Comprehensive customer data management with flexible service positions, drag-and-drop sorting, and German tax rates.

invoice_generation.title: Invoice Generation
invoice_generation.description: Batch generation of all customers for a quarter with customizable invoice numbers and automatic tax calculation.

invoice_history.title: Invoice History
invoice_history.description: Clear history of all created invoices with intelligent pagination and search functionality.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Complete configuration of company data, paths, logos, and personalized email templates.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Automatic backups with restore functionality for maximum data security.

pdf_output.title: PDF Output
pdf_output.description: Professional PDF invoices with modern design, logo integration, and German formatting.

download.headline: Start Automation Now
download.subline: Free for all major operating systems - Setup in under 5 minutes

developer.headline: Automation Born from Practice
developer.description: Dr. Thomas Entner developed QuartaBill to automate his own recurring billing processes as an occupational physician. Born from the need for efficient quarterly billing automation.
